entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 10.
